data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, In Rio de Janeiro, Marquinhos of Recife PE is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Recife PE at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick Flamengo.
In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo attack through Thiago Maia. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Attention is being given to Flamengoâ€™s Bruno Henrique and play has been suspended briefly.
Bruno Henrique has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Flamengo.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 14, Patric is booked for the away team.
Flamengo drive upfield and Gerson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Flamengo.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 22, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Marcao Silva's header is off-target for Recife PE.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Flamengo a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Recife PE's Lucas Mugni has run offside.
Mauricio Isla of Flamengo is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 27, Important block from the Flamengo defence as Ricardinho fires in a strike for Recife PE.
Flamengo's Pedro gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Recife PE.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Adryelson.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Adryelson returns to the field for Recife PE after picking up a slight injury.
Flamengo are coming forward and Pedro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
Flamengo's Gerson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo's Thiago Maia breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in Flamengo.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 41, In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo drive forward through Bruno Henrique. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Patric for Recife PE gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Recife PE's Sander gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Recife PE push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Thiago Neves gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Flamengo defence.
Gerson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Flamengo.
Throw-in high up the field for Flamengo in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 45, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Recife PE are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 46, Flamengo to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Luciano is replacing Sander for Recife PE at Estadio do Maracana.
Flamengo are pushing forward but Diego's finish is wide of the goal.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 51, Recife PE's Thiago Neves misses with an attempt on goal.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Pedro puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 51, That's a fine assist from Bruno Henrique.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Recife PE's area.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo move into a more comfortable 2-0 lead. Gustavo Henrique is the scorer with a header!
In the minute 55, Great play from Diego to set up the goal.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Flamengo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Recife PE.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Marcao Silva (Recife PE) gets a yellow card.
Daniel Paulista is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Leandro Barcia replacing Lucas Mugni.
In the minute 60, Pedro puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Bruno Henrique with an assist there.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Flamengo.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 65, Marcao Silva of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Leandro Barcia of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Recife PE attack but Adryelson's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 67, Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Recife PE needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
Recife PE pushes forward through Leandro Barcia, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Marcao Silva (Recife PE) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 72, Can Flamengo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Adryelson (Recife PE) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 73, Flamengo's Gerson is on target but unsuccessful.
The away team have replaced Marquinhos with Rogerio. This is the third substitution made today by Daniel Paulista.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Flamengo's Diego gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
The home team replace Bruno Henrique with Vitinho.
Rene is on a sub for Filipe Luis for Flamengo.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Flamengo a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Recife PE make their fourth substitution with Jonathan Gomez replacing Thiago Neves.
Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a fifth substitution, with Maxwell replacing Hernane Brocador.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 81, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Flamengo just outside Recife PE's area.
Lincoln is replacing Pedro for the home team.
Flamengo make their fourth substitution with Matheus Franca replacing Diego.
In the minute 83, Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
Thiago Maia of Flamengo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 85, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Pepe is replacing Gerson for the home team.
In the minute 87, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
Recife PE's Ricardinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick Flamengo.
Matheus Franca for Flamengo drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Recife PE.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
